title: Nourish
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, British, Scottish
description: Cafe attached to the health shop, formerly known as Riverdale Centre Organic Cafe and with the name change also removed meat from it menu (2015). Provides organic, vegetarian and vegan food. Has soup, sandwiches, toasties, cakes, daily vegan hot meal. Beverages include coffee, tea, and fresh vegetable juices. Free Wi-Fi.
